snippet.title: BlueSkies 3 - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Hi everyone! Here's a BlueSkies 3 Announcement Trailer. Showcasing both the game's environments, plot, and gameplay. Inspired by classic JRPGs that we all loved such as the Final Fantasy series. Featuring a magical fantasy world with mysteries to uncover.

Special thanks to Berry B for his amazing financial contribution to my games and his support, which made many of my game's assets possible.😍

BlueSkies 3 on Itch:
https://starmage.itch.io/blueskies-3

Hope you all enjoy! ^_^

Music:
Northsound Inc. 

Other LINKS:

(My second commercial game)

Heroes of the Seasons on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2782260/Heroes_of_the_Seasons/

(My first commercial game )

Rave Heart on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1375880/Rave_Heart/

More info on Rave Heart:
https://starmage.itch.io/rave-heart​
https://rpgmaker.net/games/10335/​
